Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Russia
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Russia 
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" was published in pamphlet by the "Primorskoye Morskoye Parakhodstvo" Publishing House in Russia on February 18.
 The work, brought out on March 1, Juche 82 (1993), lays bare the reactionary nature and falsehood of the sophism of the imperialists and renegades of socialism calling socialism "totalitarian," "barracks-like" and "administrative and commanding". The work clarifies the issue of making socialism conviction and morality, the issue of giving full play to the superiority of socialism and other principled matters in defending and accomplishing the cause of socialism.

DPRK Delegation Leaves to Participate in Six-way Talks
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves to Participate in Six-way Talks 
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Kim Kye Gwan, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, left here today to participate in the six-way talks for the settlement of the nuclear issue between the DPRK and the United States to be held in Beijing from Feb. 25.
 It was seen off at the airport by Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned, Wu Donghe, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and Oleg Dabydov, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Russian embassy here.

Greetings to Emir of Kuwait
articles.content:
Greetings to Emir of Kuwait
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Jaber Al-Ahmed Al-Jaber Al-Sabah, emir of Kuwait, on Feb. 24 on the occasion of the 43rd national day and the 13th anniversary of the liberation of his country.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily develop in conformity with the desire of the two peoples, the message wished him and the people of Kuwait greater success in their work to achieve the prosperity of the country and the peace and stability of the region.

South Side's Delegation Here
articles.content:
South Side's Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- The south side's delegation led by Kang Man Gil, president of Sangji University, arrived here Tuesday to participate in the north-south symposium on illegal designation of the East Sea of Korea as Japanese Sea and the north-south joint exhibition to urge Japan to return cultural relics plundered by the Japanese imperialists.
 The delegation was greeted at the airport by Ho Jong Ho, chairman of the History Society of the DPRK, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Deputy Secretary General of Korea Truth Commission Here
articles.content:
Deputy Secretary General of Korea Truth Commission Here
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Yoomi Jeong, deputy secretary general of the Joint Secretariat of the Korea Truth Commission, arrived here today.
 She was greeted at the airport by Ri Yong Il, vice-chairman of the North Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Massacres.
